result.execSummary:
The defendant Laquis L Dawkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams) [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense, Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: May participate in the ZCI program. Huber is granted for job search, subsequent employment, and/or treatment. Firearm warning given. Voting is prohibited until sentence is complete and civil rights have been restored.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Laquis L Dawkins

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Defendant does not plan on seeking postconviction relief.

Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in court with attorney Erin J Larsen.  Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in custody.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. Offer has been made.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 1, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in court with attorney Erin J Larsen.  Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in custody.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. Defense atty needs time to go over case with def. 
BTC:   ADJ. Finding of good cause to waive time limits.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 14, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:    It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Stay out of Twins Food Mart.    Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in court with attorney Carl B Johnson.  Defendant Laquis L Dawkins in custody.  Sharon A Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 14, 2014 at 09:00 am.
